metadata.synopsis: SoB member one-liner for Professor Limeleech, a pompous scholar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Use debug book to reach the Lodge

0.speaker: Professor Limeleech
0.text: Once I publish my paper proving that it's just hyena mite infections that make gnolls so angry, I'll be famous!

1.speaker: Professor Limeleech
1.text: I should get to work on my acceptance speech for the Society research prize.
